nodes.name: deployAndStart

devdoc.author: Joseph Reed
devdoc.details: This contract's goal is to make it super easy to create a recurring transaction by setting several default values

params._defaultFactory: The default factory contract responsible for deploying decentralized transactions
params._defaultOracle: The default gas price oracle responsible for predicting future gas costs
params._defaultPaymentDelegate: The default payment delegate contract responsible for handling payments

params.wallet: The funding wallet, change address, and owner of the deployed alarms

params.callAddress: The address the transaction will call each time it is triggered
params.callData: The data the transaction will send with the call
params.callOptions: The options defining how and when to trigger the transaction        [callValue, callGas, startTimestamp, windowSize, intervalValue, intervalUnit, maxIntervals]
params.wallet: The funding wallet, change address, and owner of the deployed alarms

devdoc.title: RecurringTransactionDeployer

methods.constructor: Constructor to create a smart contract which aids in creating a recurring transaction

deploy(address).notice: Creates a recurring transaction belonging to the specified wallet

deployAndStart(address,address,bytes,uin.notice: Creates and starts a recurring transaction belonging to the specified wallet with the specified call options
